unnormalised: Bharotiya dori marganchea buneadi suvidhent sudharna zatalea vishayantlea halinchya lekhacho sandarbh gheun, Mumbai ani Mandva hancham'modleo Ro-Ro feri sevechea margan yatrecho vell sumar 1 horak lagta, zo poili roddin 4 horanchea lagtalem to dukhavpak zai. Sagarmala projhektakhala mandur kel'li hi vikasatmak udheog yatrayechi vadd kortali. Techobhar, Kochi ani Chennai saarkea doreadegeleanchea shaharancher passenger terminalache unnati Q4 2024 meren purn zavpachi asa, zachi andazhi kharch ₹250 Cr asa, tem samudrik paryatanak vado ditalem.
normalised: Bharatiya samudri margantlea infrastructure sudharannancher adharit halinchya lekhacho sandarbh gheun mhunnchem zalear, Mumbai ani Mandwa hantuntli R-o-R-o ferry seva mhunnjech roll-on/roll-off ferry service-en vatavele char voranche tulnen vell ek vorakhatir khubuch unno kel'la. Sagarmala projectachea adhin onay zal'le he unnathi konektiviti ani tourism vaddounk pavtoli. Ani, Kochi ani Chennai sarkhea darya laginchea shaharantlea yatrikankhatirachea terminalanche unnathi kamak don xembain ani ponchvis crore rupiancho kharch yeun Q char don hozar ani chovis meren tem purnn zatolem, ani tem maritim tourismak boll divnk pavtolem.
text: Bharotiya dori marganchea buneadi suvidhent sudharna zatalea vishayantlea halinchya lekhacho sandarbh gheun, Mumbai ani Mandva hancham'modleo Ro-Ro feri sevechea margan yatrecho vell sumar 1 horak lagta, zo poili roddin 4 horanchea lagtalem to dukhavpak zai. Sagarmala projhektakhala mandur kel'li hi vikasatmak udheog yatrayechi vadd kortali. Techobhar, Kochi ani Chennai saarkea doreadegeleanchea shaharancher passenger terminalache unnati Q4 2024 meren purn zavpachi asa, zachi andazhi kharch ₹250 Cr asa, tem samudrik paryatanak vado ditalem.
